original_title: Kataklysm a moment in time tour
overview: Kataklysm will be celebrating their 25th anniversary next October on the A Moment In Time Tour. Each stop of the European/U.K. trek will feature the band performing their albums Shadows & Dus (2002) and Serenity In Fire back to back.
tagline: Kataklysm a moment in time tour
title: Kataklysm a moment in time tour
